website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price point for excellent quality audio. Supports high-resolution audio.
pros: Simple 2.1 channel design in a soundbar makes it easy to set up and use
Can add more speakers wirelessly by purchasing them separately
May stream music from mobile devices through a Bluetooth connection
cons: No apps built into the soundbar

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a 100 watt sound bar to this and the quality is absolutely amazing. There was initially an error message that would cut it randomly while searching for the pair of rear speakers (sold separately) but I updated the firmware and the issue was resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Dion

customer_reviews.title: Works well my LG TV. The onlu negative is ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well my LG TV. The onlu negative is there doesn't seem to be a way to control the base level on the woofe/.
customer_reviews.author: Victor A. Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, using with our LG Smart TV and it is seemless.
customer_reviews.author: Catt.E.Whompus

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal, I'm sure their gone now. Great price reduction, easy to install, just make sure you hit at least 1 stud. Good sound quality, no tunnel echo.
customer_reviews.author: Grimone

customer_reviews.title: Fair price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't give it a 5 because my Samasung bar has much better base in the same price range but this is a nice unit for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Solid perfect
customer_reviews.text: Overall good sound. Sub does require line of sight that can be blocked fairly easily, but it’s not a huge deal. Happy with it for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: DiamondW

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: In a small or medium sized room this will shake your windows!
customer_reviews.author: Levar white

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty happy with the quality but the problem is blue ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty happy with the quality but the problem is blue tooth is not secured. Someone else can use it if lives near by.
customer_reviews.author: Ankan pal

customer_reviews.title: Not so well!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with the box totally damaged. In really poor conditions. I was not able to test until I get home back in Brazil. Luckily it's working. But in the the beginning I was wondering if I bought a new item.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Castilho

customer_reviews.title: Box is beaten to a pulp.
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to show/send proof of delivery. I need to give this as a birthday gift and I’m not sure if the contents of the package “survived” delivery. I can’t open and inspect right now but the box is damaged pretty badly and barely holds the contents inside without falling out. If the contents are damaged I’ll be returning for a refund. This box is unacceptable but I need to give as a gift so it’ll be a little embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: David Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super soundbar at a great price! Easy to set up and enhance sound quality immensely!
customer_reviews.author: Hien & Bao

product_meta.title: LG Electronics SJ5Y 2.1 Channel 320 Watt High Resolution Audio Sound Bar (2017 Model)
product_meta.description: This stylish, powerful sound bar supports CTA-certified high-res audio at up to 24-bit/96kHz quality, in addition to Adaptive Sound Control that automatically optimizes the audio of movies, sports, games and more.
feature_bullets: CTA-Certified High Resolution Audio Wireless Surround Kit Ready* (Surround Kit Sold Separately)
320 Watt Total Output Power - Wireless Active Subwoofer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
